amendment.description: To modify the definition of the term "container security device".

vote.text: Amendment SA 5001 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5001 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S9584-9585; text: CR S9584-9585) To modify the definition of the term "container security device".
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5001 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
